about_the_game:
Get ready for an adventure like no other with the fifth expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Exalted Heroes of Folkswave". This expansion brings you an unforgettable journey filled with new NPCs, Perks, Enemies, and Cards.

Immerse yourself in around 30 captivating NPC-driven stories, each offering unique narrative paths and varying in size. Your choices within these stories may even lead to additional branching narratives, enhancing the replayability factor and providing endless possibilities.

Prepare to face over 100 formidable new enemies, each meticulously designed to challenge your strategic card tactics and put your skills to the test. These fresh opponents will ignite a new level of excitement and intensity in your gameplay, offering thrilling encounters and thrilling battles.

With over 250 new perks at your disposal, you'll have abundant opportunities to enhance your characters and craft unique builds within different subclasses. These perks add depth and customization options, empowering you to tailor your playstyle and create truly personalized strategies.

Brace yourself for a staggering collection of approximately 500 new cards, encompassing approximately 120 allies, 120 legendary items, and a multitude of other exciting additions. These new cards introduce fresh strategies, synergies, and endless possibilities to your deck-building adventures, opening up new avenues for exploration and mastery.

Get ready to delve into the vast world of "Exalted Heroes" and unlock its secrets.

Are you prepared to embrace the challenges and forge your own legendary path in this extraordinary expansion?
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

DLCs for Erannorth progressively increase the game's complexity and difficulty and aren't recommended to own before you are familiar with the base game. If you try to decide which to get between the available DLCs, I would advise getting them in release order for a smoother transition in Difficulty and Complexity.

name: Erannorth Chronicles - Exalted Heroes of Folkswave

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Erannorth Chronicles - Exalted Heroes of Folkswave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.

short_description: Get ready for an adventure like no other with the fifth expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Exalted Heroes of Folkswave". This expansion takes you on an unforgettable journey filled with new NPCs, Perks, Enemies, and Cards.
